panels.description: The amount of damage the top 3 players have dealt in the entire game up until now.
panels.title: Damage dealt

panels.description: The amount of damage the top 3 players have received in the entire game up until now.
panels.title: Damage received

panels.description: The amount of units and buildings the top 3 players have produced in the entire game up until now.
panels.title: Units produced

panels.description: The amount of units and buildings the top 3 players have killed in the entire game up until now.
panels.title: Units killed

panels.description: The amount of construction turrets the top 3 players have right now.
panels.title: Construction Turrets

panels.description: The amount of energy the top 3 players need to fully run all their energy converters right now.
panels.title: E-Conv Energy Need

panels.description: The sum of all the building and unit buildspeeds for the top 3 players (including units that have buildspeed but cannot actually build units by themselves, like rezzers or construction turrets).
panels.title: Buildspeed

panels.description: The number of factories the top 3 players have.
panels.title: Factories

panels.description: The amount of metal the top 3 players have in static (i.e. non-mobile) units and buildings from the Combat category (almost anything with a weapon).
panels.title: Metal Combat Static

panels.description: The amount of metal the top 3 players have in mobile (i.e. can move around on its own) units from the Combat category (almost anything with a weapon).
panels.title: Metal Combat Mobile

panels.description: The amount of metal the top 3 players have in Economy buildings and units.
panels.title: Metal Economy

panels.description: The amount of metal the top 3 players have in Production buildings.
panels.title: Metal Production

panels.description: The amount of metal for the top 3 players that they have in Utility static (i.e. non-mobile) units and buildings (e.g. Radar, Jammer, ...)
panels.title: Metal Utility Static

panels.description: The amount of metal for the top 3 players that they have in Utility mobile (i.e. can move on their own) units (e.g. Radar, Jammer, ...)
panels.title: Metal Utility Mobile

panels.description: The current wind strength.
panels.title: Wind Strength

panels.description: The tidal strength, fixed for a map, does not vary.
panels.title: Tidal Strength

panels.description: The total amount of metal produced by each Team up until now.
panels.title: Metal produced

panels.description: The total amount of energy produced by each Team up until now.
panels.title: Energy produced

panels.description: Current energy expense.
panels.title: Energy Expense

panels.description: Current metal expense.
panels.title: Metal Expense

panels.description: Current energy income.
panels.title: Energy Income

panels.description: Current metal income.
panels.title: Metal Income
